meanings.definition: A passage or door that allows access to a building or room.
meanings.sent1: The entranceway to the museum was grand and welcoming.
meanings.sent2: Please use the entranceway to come inside the building.
meanings.sent3: The entranceway seemed to be in a hurry, swinging open quickly.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was the entranceway to her warm personality.
meanings.sent5: The entranceway, with its intricate design, left a lasting impression on visitors.

meanings.definition: The act of entering a place.
meanings.sent1: His entranceway into the party was met with cheers and applause.
meanings.sent2: The entranceway of the store was bustling with shoppers.
meanings.sent3: The entranceway decided to make a dramatic entrance, twirling in gracefully.
meanings.sent4: With determination as his entranceway, he tackled the challenge head-on.
meanings.sent5: The entranceway of the forest was like stepping into a magical world.
